name: (Personal) Space Invader
description:
Made for the jam Do It IV Shacknews, which had the theme "Be Relatively Evil".

Explore a vibrant small space! Be kind of a dick! 

Controls:
Click to move,
Spacebar - toggles the camera lock
Escape - quit
L - toggles the low poly look
P - toggles the postprocessing

There's no winning or losing, you just click around.

Its short but hopefully sweet, creating the little zones took far longer than anticipated.
